columns.name: DeviceId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the device in the service

columns.name: DeviceName
columns.description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device

columns.name: OSPlatform
columns.description: Platform of the operating system running on the device. This indicates specific operating systems, including variations within the same family, such as Windows 11, Windows 10 and Windows 7.

columns.name: OSVersion
columns.description: Version of the operating system running on the device

columns.name: ConfigurationId
columns.description: Unique identifier for a specific configuration

columns.name: IsCompliant
columns.description: Indicates whether the device that initiated the event is compliant or not

columns.name: IsApplicable
columns.description: Indicates whether the configuration or policy is applicable

columns.name: Source
columns.description: The registry path or other location used to determine the current device setting

columns.name: RecommendedValue
columns.description: Set of expected values for the current device setting to be compliant

columns.name: CurrentValue
columns.description: Set of detected values found on the device

columns.name: IsExempt
columns.description: Indicates whether the device is exempt from having the baseline configuration
